channel.title: [Delta] 317 How to add Dailies

item.title: [Delta] 317 How to add Dailies
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Client.java
Need to declare an int

	public int[] daily = new int[10000];

Look for this line

						taskID = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					} else if (token.equals("character-taskAmount")) {
						taskAmount = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					} else if (token.equals("character-jad")) {
						killedJad = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					} else if (token.equals("character-q1")) {
						q1 = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Add this line

			} else if (token.equals("character-daily")) {
				daily[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer.parseInt(token3[1]);

Look for this line

			characterfile.write("[ITEMS]", 0, 7);
			characterfile.newLine();
			for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
				if (playerItems[i] > 0) {
					characterfile.write("character-item = ", 0, 17);
					characterfile.write(Integer.toString(i), 0, Integer
							.toString(i).length());
					characterfile.write("	", 0, 1);
					characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerItems[i]), 0,
							Integer.toString(playerItems[i]).length());
					characterfile.write("	", 0, 1);
					characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerItemsN[i]), 0,
							Integer.toString(playerItemsN[i]).length());
					characterfile.newLine();
				}
			}
					characterfile.newLine();

add this line

			characterfile.write("[Daily]", 0, 7);
					characterfile.newLine();
			for (int i = 0; i < daily.length; i++) {
				if (daily[i] > 0) {
					characterfile.write("character-daily = ", 0, 18);
					characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily[i]), 0,
							Integer.toString(daily[i]).length());
					characterfile.write("	", 0, 1);
					characterfile.newLine();
				}
			}
			characterfile.newLine();

Stating the Void for the Daily Task

	public void DailyTask(int RequiredItem, int RequiredAmt, int NpcId, int GivenReward, int GivenAmt, int ExpType, int ExpAmt, int DailyID) {

		//Daily Types 1-10000
		
		//set ExpType to 0 if you dont want to give a reward;
		//set ExpAmt to 0 if you dont want to give a reward;

					//Daily Check
		if (daily[DailyID] != GetLastLogin(0)) {
			if (!playerHasItem(RequiredItem, RequiredAmt) && RequiredItem > 0) {
						//Request Message
				talk2("Your task is to bring me "+RequiredAmt+" "+getItemName(RequiredItem), "Please return with the items for reward",NpcId);

			} else {

							//Thank Message
				talk2("Your task is to bring me "+RequiredAmt+" "+getItemName(RequiredItem), "Thank you for bringing these, i have your reward.",NpcId);

				if (RequiredAmt <= 28) {
					for (int i = 0; i < RequiredAmt; i++) {
						deleteItem(RequiredItem, 1);
					}
				} else {
					deleteItem(RequiredItem, RequiredAmt);
				}
					//adding Item Reward
			if (GivenReward <= 28) {
				for (int i = 0; i < GivenAmt; i++) {
					addItem(GivenReward, 1);
				sM("Your reward is "+getItemName(GivenReward)+" x"+GivenAmt+"");
				}
			} else {
					addItem(GivenReward, GivenAmt);
				sM("Your reward is "+getItemName(GivenReward)+" x"+GivenAmt+"");
			}

					//Setting the daily to a new day
				daily[DailyID] = GetLastLogin(0);

					//AddExp	
				if (ExpAmt > 0) {
					addSkillXP(ExpAmt, ExpType);
					sM("You recieve "+ExpAmt+", Exp in "+SkillType(ExpType));
					refreshSkills();
				} else {
					refreshSkills();
				}


			}
		} else {
					//Please come back tomarrow msg
			talk2("You have already Completed my task today", "please come back tomarrow", NpcId);
		}


	}
                  Return the Skill Name its giving xp for in your daily

	public String SkillType(int skill) {
		if (skill == 0) {
			return"Attack";
		} if (skill == 1) {
	return"Defence";
		} if (skill == 2) {
	return"Strength";
		} if (skill == 3) {
	return"Hitpoints";
		} if (skill == 4) {
	return"Ranged";
		} if (skill == 5) {
	return"Prayer";
		} if (skill == 6) {
	return"Magic";
		} if (skill == 7) {
	return"Cooking";
		} if (skill == 8) {
	return"Woodcutting";
		} if (skill == 9) {
	return"Fletching";
		} if (skill == 10) {
	return"Fishing";
		} if (skill == 11) {
	return"Firemaking";
		} if (skill == 12) {
	return"Crafting";
		} if (skill == 13) {
	return"Smithing";
		} if (skill == 14) {
	return"Mining";
		} if (skill == 15) {
	return"Herblore";
		} if (skill == 16) {
	return"Agility";
		} if (skill == 17) {
	return"Thieving";
		} if (skill == 18) {
	return"Slayer";
		} if (skill == 19) {
	return"Farming";
		} if (skill == 20) {
	return"Runecrafting";
		}
	return"";
	}

Its saying if you talk to an npc when the npcid == npcId you have chosen
then do the following void: DailyTask
Daily Task will check for Item Req
if you have the required item and the amount
then continue.

The dailytask will give
addItem(GivenItem,GivenAmt);

If it is less then 28 it will loop
addItem(GivenItem, 1);
giving items untill givenamt is reached

Meaning it will give stackable and non stackable items just fine

same with Deleting required items

[size=18pt] Example[/size]

if (NPCID == NpcId) {
		DailyTask(ItemReq, ItemAmt, NpcId, GivenItem, GivenAmt, XpType, XpAmt, DailyId);
	}

It will only send you a message if your ExpAmt is greater then 0
same with giving an item

item.title: [Delta] 317 How to add Dailies
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

PM me a PI source and i will get started and ill post another topic.

Just posted a PI source based daily system
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,472774.0.html\

[size=18pt]How to add vet status with Dailies for ::yell[/size] – Ran out of space so i guess ill start another guide inside my guide… Delta based. - Post here if you find any bugs

Unfortantitly i dont have a way to reach back to the beggining where you character was created so it would be based on a new system each time you log in your daily1 goes up.

but ill explain again here
You will need this bit of code

import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

Placed after any of this

import java.io.File;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;

This with any of your integers

   public int GetLastLogin(int Date) 
   {
      Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
      int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
      int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
      int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
      int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);

      return (calc - Date);
   }

      public int daily1a = 0;
      public int daily1b = 0;

Then you will now search for this line

               } else if (token.equals("character-brightness")) {
                  brightness = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-fighttype")) {
                  FightType = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-skill")) {
                  SkillID = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-chat")) {
                  splitChat = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-ancients")) {
                  playerAncientMagics = Integer.parseInt(token2);

add this line

               } else if (token.equals("character-daily1a")) {
                  Daily1a = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-daily1b")) {
                  Daily1b = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Then now look for your log in going to add veteran

Now look for any of this

         characterfile.write("character-action = ", 0, 19);
         characterfile.write(Integer.toString(action), 0, Integer.toString(action).length());
         characterfile.newLine();
         characterfile.write("character-pcpoints = ", 0, 21);
         characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pcPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pcPoints).length());
         characterfile.newLine();
         characterfile.write("character-ZbPoints = ", 0, 21);
         characterfile.write(Integer.toString(ZbPoints), 0, Integer.toString(ZbPoints).length());
         characterfile.newLine();
               characterfile.write("character-assault = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(assaultKills), 0, Integer.toString(assaultKills).length());
               characterfile.newLine();

Now add this

               characterfile.write("character-daily1a = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily1a), 0, Integer.toString(daily1a).length());
               characterfile.newLine();
               characterfile.write("character-daily1b = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily1b), 0, Integer.toString(daily1a).length());
               characterfile.newLine();

Then look for this

               IPPart1 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(0,
                     start[0]));
               IPPart2 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
                     (start[0] + 1), start[1]));
               IPPart3 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
                     (start[1] + 1), start[2]));
               IPPart4 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
                     (start[2] + 1), (start[3])));
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
            }
         }
      }
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && q1 != 15 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && q1 != 15){
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerWeapon);
}

then add this

   if (daily1a != GetLastLogin(1)) 
   {//Starts Check
         daily1a = GetLastLogin(1);//Sets daily to todays Date
         daily1b += 1; Veteran Points +1 per day you log in
   }

Very simple system. just saying…

Now to make it Check for this information in the yell

		if (command.startsWith("yell") && (command.length() > 5)) {
			if (!muted) {
				String text = command.substring(5);
				String[] bad = { "chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq" };
				for (String element : bad) {
					if (text.indexOf(element) >= 0) {
						return;
					}
				}
				lastMessage[0] = lastMessage[1];
				lastMessage[1] = lastMessage[2];
				lastMessage[2] = Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
						+ text.substring(1);
				if (lastMessage[0].equals(lastMessage[1])
						&& lastMessage[1].equals(lastMessage[2]))
					sM(playerName + ":  "
							+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
							+ text.substring(1));
				else
					yell("["+getRank()+"]"+playerName + ":  "
							+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
							+ text.substring(1));
			} else
				sM("["+getRank()+"]"+playerName + ":  " + command.substring(5));

		}

Then to get your new rank

public String getRank() {
      int VetDay = 60;
      if (playerRights == 0 && daily1b < VetDay) {
            return "Nomal";
      }
      if (playerRights == 1 && daily1b < VetDay) {
            return "Mod";
      }
      if (playerRights == 2 && daily1b < VetDay) {
            return "Admin";
      }
      if (playerRights == 3 && daily1b < VetDay) {
            return "Owner";//Or set it to Normal for hiding
      }
      if (playerRights == 0 && daily1b >= VetDay) {
            return "Vet Nomal";
      }
      if (playerRights == 1 && daily1b >= VetDay) {
            return "Vet Mod";
      }
      if (playerRights == 2 && daily1b >= VetDay) {
            return "Vet Admin";
      }
      if (playerRights == 3 && daily1b >= VetDay) {
            return "Vet Owner";//Or set it to Normal for hiding
      }
}

item.title: [Delta] 317 How to add Dailies
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[center][size=16pt]
Difficulty: 3.5/10
Length: #/10 - Depends what you add
Files modified: client.java, server.java, item.java[/size]
[size=15pt]Updated as of January 2nd, 2011[/size]
[size=14pt]This guide is Mostly Based on how Creative you are[/size]

[size=12pt]Depends on how you are with code i guess
Definition of Daily:of, done, occurring, or issued each day or each weekday: daily attendance; a daily newspaper.
[/size]Red = Explaination
[size=14pt]
[b]*This guide includes the following

*Code that Defines what today is
*Public ints used for this guide
*Recalling Dailys and Writing them
*Daily Commands
*Log in and recieve Items once a day
*Start of a very Mini Quest
*No Trade Code
*Start of random Item from Object once a day
[/b][/size]
This is to add Something that can only be done once a day Haven’t seen any servers with this so ill be showing it.
Please dont flame it because its for delta
[size=12pt]This is a Java Statment that just adds dates to your server[/size][/center]First 2 lines in your Code should be in your Client.java Should be these 2 Lines.[size=16pt]Very Important This code Calls up What is today’s Date[/size]
Explination of GregorianCalendar
More information can be found here
http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/util/GregorianCalendar.html
Says download but its not downloading anything

public class GregorianCalendar // means it is import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
extends Calendar //Meaning it is using the import java.util.Calendar;//Need both to work.

GregorianCalendar is a concrete subclass of Calendar and provides the standard calendar used by most of the world.

The standard (Gregorian) calendar has 2 eras, BC and AD.

This implementation handles a single discontinuity, which corresponds by default to the date the Gregorian calendar was instituted (October 15, 1582 in some countries, later in others).

Importanting this code is the calendar Required.
This should be the first 2 lines in your code

import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

next to any of these codes

import java.io.File;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;

[code]
public int GetLastLogin(int Date)
{
Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);

  return (calc - Date);

}
[/code][size=11pt]This code is Simply a Code so you can use
My ::food, my mini Quest and my Log in for dragon tokens code.[/size]
Then you will need to add[size=16pt]
Public ints[/size]

public int daily1a = 0; public int daily1b = 0; public int daily2a; public int daily3a; [size=11pt]This is the statement that recalls Your information when you log in [/size]Now search for[size=16pt]
Recalling Information[/size]

} else if (token.equals("character-brightness")) { brightness = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-fighttype")) { FightType = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-skill")) { SkillID = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-chat")) { splitChat = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-ancients")) { playerAncientMagics = Integer.parseInt(token2); [size=11pt]New information
That will be recalling when you log in [/size]And add this line after that

               } else if (token.equals("character-daily1a")) {
                  Daily1a = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-daily1b")) {
                  Daily1b = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-daily2a")) {
                  Daily2a = Integer.parseInt(token2);
               } else if (token.equals("character-daily3a")) {
                  Daily3a = Integer.parseInt(token2);

[size=16pt]Writing Daily Information to your character file[/size][size=11pt]
This Writes the Information to a character file when logging off or disconnecting[/size]Now Search for characterfile.write("character-action = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(action), 0, Integer.toString(action).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-pcpoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pcPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pcPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-ZbPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(ZbPoints), 0, Integer.toString(ZbPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-assault = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(assaultKills), 0, Integer.toString(assaultKills).length()); characterfile.newLine(); [size=11pt]
This is new Information that is written to a character file when logging off or disconnecting[/size]now add this

               characterfile.write("character-daily1a = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily1a), 0, Integer.toString(daily1a).length());
               characterfile.newLine();
               characterfile.write("character-daily1b = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily1b), 0, Integer.toString(daily1a).length());
               characterfile.newLine();
               characterfile.write("character-daily2a = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily2a), 0, Integer.toString(daily2a).length());
               characterfile.newLine();
               characterfile.write("character-daily3a = ", 0, 20);
               characterfile.write(Integer.toString(daily3a), 0, Integer.toString(daily3a).length());
               characterfile.newLine();

[size=16pt]Start of Daily Commands[/size][size=11pt]
This is a code that checks your dailies
and will give you ::food up to 10 times a day
[/size][b]Now for a simple Command

[/b][b]This code Checks your dailies if Not done then Tally set to 0If today is the same day it will increase your daily1b by 1if above 9 so if 10 or more then it will not give you foodgives you 28 not noted manta ray

[/b]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food") && (playerRights >= 0))
{
//This allows any player to do it Can add player Rights if you prefer Or donator

if (daily1a != GetLastLogin(1)) 
{
   //If your Daily was not typed today Reset tally to 0
   daily1a = GetLastLogin(1);
   daily1b = 0;
} 


if (daily1a == GetLastLogin(1) && daily1b < 10)
{
   //Checks to see if your daily is today if so 
   //checks to make sure you have less typed 
   //::food less then 10 times today

   for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++)
   {//Cyles this next line 28 Times
      //Adds 1 Manta ray in to your Inventory Not noted 28 Times
      addItem(392,1);
   }// Ends Cycle

   daily1b += 1;//Increases Daily1b 
         //Assuming this is Successful it will add 1
         // to your Minimum times you can type ::food
}

   if (daily1b >= 10) 
   {//Checks for your Daily and checks if you have done it less then 10 times
      sM("You can only type ::food 10 times a day");
   }

}//Ends statment
[/code][b]this is just the login code for when you log in[/b][b]Or you can Make it every time you log in you receive some kind of token or Gold
Search for[/b]This is just the simple code you normaly find right when you log in on the normal DeltaScape source
[code]
               IPPart1 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(0,
                     start[0]));
               IPPart2 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
                     (start[0] + 1), start[1]));
               IPPart3 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
                     (start[1] + 1), start[2]));
               IPPart4 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
                     (start[2] + 1), (start[3])));
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
            }
         }
      }
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && q1 != 15 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && q1 != 15){
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerWeapon);
}
[/code]
[size=16pt]Start of Log in and recieve an Item Code[/size][b][size=11pt]This is a code that gives you 2 Dragon Tokens every time you log in on my server it was for a shop you can edit any of this information for your personal gain[/size][/b][b]Places this after that[/b]This code checks if your daily2a Int is today if not it will check if you have space in your inventory if you have inventory space it will give you 2 dragon tokens also sets daily2a to today's date if no space is available it will tell you your inventory is full
[code]
   if (daily2a != GetLastLogin(1)) 
   {//Starts Check

      if (playerHasItem(-1, 1)) 
      {
         //Checks for Inventory Space
         addItem(7478, 2);
         // If yes adds Dragon tokens
         sM("You have not claimed your daily Dragon Tokens today");
         sM("You recieve 2 Dragon Tokens");
         daily2a = GetLastLogin(1);//Sets daily to todays Date
      }//Ends Check

   }//Ends First Check

   //Starts a second Check
   if (daily2a != GetLastLogin(1)) 
   {
      //daily2 is still not today then
      sM("Your inventory was full");
      sM("relog when you are ready to claim your tokens.");
   }//Ends Check
[/code][size=16pt]Start of Daily Quests[/size]
Or you can make this in to a mini quest [b]Talking to an NpcSearching for this[/b][b]This is the standard search i do for deltascape sources for npcs that talk (First option)[/b][code]

[b][size=11pt]This code here just checks if your dailies has been done today or not[/size][/b][b]Adding this[/b][b]This code will check if your clicking (talking) to the correct Npc
If so it will start your check for your daily3a Int if it is the same as today's date
it will send you a face and a message in your chat bar saying your task is complete

(I could have done Else statments but i guess i got lazy and simply put it in this order because it was simple for me.)

then it will start a second check if today's date was the last time it was complete if it is not today
it will look to see if you have 20 iron ore in your inventory if Not it will send you the first menu asking you to bring 20 iron ore

if you have the 20 iron ore, it will give you a reward of 25k xp and gold and then set daily3a as today's date
[/b][code]
// Npcid
if(NPCID == ####)
{ 

//Starts your Check for your daily
   if (daily3a == GetLastLogin(1)) 
   {

         //If daily has been completed Will send face and Message in to chat bar

      sendFrame200(4883, 591);

         //Dont forget the npcid Here

      sendFrame126(GetNpcName(####), 4884);
           sendFrame126("You have completed my task today", 4885);
           sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886);

         //Dont forget the npcid Here

           sendFrame75(####, 4883);
           sendFrame164(4882);
           NpcDialogueSend = true;
   }//End of first check

   //If daily was not done today
   else if (daily3a != GetLastLogin(1)) 
   {

      //Checks for Requirements in this case - 20 Iron Ore
      //If player does not have Requirements - States what Npc wants
      if (!playerHasItem(440, 20)) 
      {
         sendFrame200(4883, 591);

            //Add NpcId here

              sendFrame126(GetNpcName(####), 4884);//Npc Name
              sendFrame126("please bring me 20 iron ore", 4885);//Should probaly State what the requirement is
              sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886);
            
            //Add NpcId here

              sendFrame75(####, 4883);//This is for NPC Face
              sendFrame164(4882);
              NpcDialogueSend = true;
      }//Ends check for Not having Required items

      //Starts check if player has Required items
      else if (playerHasItem(440, 20)) 
      {

         //Daily becomes Today

         daily3a = GetLastLogin(1);
         sM("Your Mining Daily Has been completed");
         
         //Place Rewards in this section
            //Gives Gold
         sM("You recieve 25 Thousand gold");
         addItem(995, 25000);
            //Gives Exp
         sM("You recieve 25 thousand Mining experience");
         addSkillXP(25000, playerMining);
            //Ends Reward
      }
      //Ends check on What today is
   }

}//Ends the entire Statment

[size=16pt]Start of random Item from Object once a day[/size]
This next script is just to show you where your Object1 Section is
[size=12pt]How to add a Object that will give you a random Item in a list of items once a day![/size]
[size=10pt]First you will need to find your Object1 section
Code looks very similar to this[/size]

      case 132:
         int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
         int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
         int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
         int face = 0;
         int face2 = 0;
         int GateID = 1;
         if (!validClient || randomed)
            break;
         if (!antiHax())
            break;
         if (debug || (playerRights > 1)) {
            println("serverobjs size " + server.objects.size());
            println_debug("atObject: " + objectX + "," + objectY
                  + " objectID: " + objectID); // 147 might be id for
            // object state changing
         }
         int xDiff = Math.abs(absX - objectX);
         int yDiff = Math.abs(absY - objectY);
         boolean found = false;
         resetAction(false);
         TurnPlayerTo(objectX, objectY);
         updateRequired = true;
         appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
         long time2 = System.currentTimeMillis();
         if (time2 - globalCooldown[0] <= 50) {
            sM("Action throttled... please wait longer before acting!");
            break;
         }
         if (misc.random(100) == 1) {
            triggerRandom();
            break;
         }
         if ((xDiff > 5) || (yDiff > 5)) {
            println("Client hack detected!");
            break;
         }

Next you will be adding a new line that looks very similar to this
ObjectID you want

     This line is very simple for a ItemId
     int ItemGiven = ####;//ItemId you want or

     This line is To give you an Item based on 555+0-25
     int ItemGiven = 555+misc.random(25);//ItemId you want or

     Misc.random(#) includes 0 alot of people will do if (misc.random(2) == 1)
     This is saying you have a 33% not a 50% beacuse it does random 0,1,2

     addItem(ItemGiven, ####);//normaly the #### should just be 1

   if(objectID == ####) {//ObjectID you want

      if (daily4a != GetLastLogin(1)) {


         //This line is very simple for a ItemId
         int ItemGiven = ####;//ItemId you want or

         //This line is To give you an Item based on 555+0-25
         int ItemGiven = 555+misc.random(25);//ItemId you want or

         //Add Item Code Goes here
         addItem(ItemGiven, ####);//normaly the #### should just be 1
            //OR better Remove Slashes infront of AddItem if you prefer that code
         //addItem(Item.randomDailyItem(), 1);//If you do this step Follow the Next step
         daily4a = GetLastLogin(1);
      }

   }

}

        {
